HeroBanner.title: Make Your Voice Heard, Shape the Future
HeroBanner.description: Influence the future of society, brands, and the world around you with Votly. Share your opinions and earn rewards in return.

InfoSection.title: Share Your Views, Earn Rewards
InfoSection.impactDescription: Your input answers pressing questions and influences key decisions.
InfoSection.differenceTitle: See the Difference You Can Make
InfoSection.rewardsTitle: Earn Rewards That Matter to You
InfoSection.rewardsDescription: Choose from a variety of rewards, including gift cards and exclusive offers.
InfoSection.opinionDescription: Your feedback drives innovation. When you participate in Votly Paid Surveys, you influence decisions made by global brands, helping them create better products and services for everyone.

rewardsList.title: Earn Rewards That Matter to You
rewardsList.cash: Cash Rewards: Redeem your earnings for various gift cards and vouchers.
rewardsList.giftCards: Gift Cards: Choose from a variety of popular brands like Amazon, Noon, and more.
rewardsList.exclusive: Exclusive Offers: Enjoy special discounts, early access to products, and bonus rewards.

differenceList.title: Why Your Opinion Matters
differenceList.surveys: Diverse Survey Opportunities: We work with top brands across industries, giving you a variety of engaging surveys to choose from.
differenceList.bonus: Bonus Earning Opportunities: Refer friends and earn extra rewards for each successful referral.
differenceList.global: Global Access: No matter where you are, Votly gives you the power to participate and earn.

testimonial1.text: I love how easy it is to earn with Votly. I complete surveys during my breaks and redeem rewards every month!
testimonial1.author: Aisha, UAE

testimonial2.text: Votly paid surveys have become my favorite way to earn rewards. Simple, fast, and rewarding!
testimonial2.author: Mohamed, KSA

FeaturesList.title: Unlocking Benefits for Individuals, Corporates, and Governments
FeaturesList.subtitle: VOTLY offers a versatile platform that caters to the unique needs of individuals, businesses, and government entities...

feature1.title: Market and Research Tool
feature1.description: Ideal for market research and various studies, empowering users to gather valuable data and insights to drive informed decisions.

feature2.title: Individuals
feature2.description: Engage with a diverse community, sharing opinions and gaining insights into current trends and public sentiment.

feature3.title: Corporates
feature3.description: Conduct efficient market research, identify consumer preferences, and boost brand engagement through interactive content.

feature4.title: Governments
feature4.description: Gauge public opinion, encourage civic participation, and gather insights for data-driven decision-making.

feature5.title: Collaborative Environment
feature5.description: Foster partnerships between individuals, businesses, and governments to drive innovation and positive change.

feature6.title: Comprehensive Research Platform
feature6.description: Combining AI-generated content, user-created polls, and advanced analytics, VOTLY offers a powerful solution for diverse research needs.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

faq1.question: How much can I earn with Votly surveys?
faq1.answer: Earnings vary based on the survey's length and complexity. On average, surveys pay between $1 to $10, and some special surveys offer even more.

faq2.question: How will I get paid?
faq2.answer: You can redeem your points for gift cards, vouchers, or other exciting rewards once you reach the minimum threshold.

faq3.question: Is my personal information safe?
faq3.answer: Absolutely. We take privacy seriously. Your data is secure, and we'll never share your information without consent.

faq4.question: How often will I get survey invitations?
faq4.answer: That depends on your profile and interests. The more complete your profile, the more relevant surveys you'll receive.

faq5.question: How long does it take to receive my rewards?
faq5.answer: Once you redeem, rewards are typically processed within 48 hours. Quick, easy, and reliable.

FAQ.ctaDescription: Don't let your opinions go unheard. Start making your voice count—and earn while doing it.
FAQ.helpDescription: We're here to help. Contact us and our team will guide you through any questions or concerns.

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Join our community and start earning rewards by sharing your valuable opinions in just a few simple steps.

step1.title: Sign Up for Free
step1.description: Create your account in minutes. No hidden fees or commitments.

step2.title: Get Matched with Surveys
step2.description: Based on your profile, we'll invite you to participate in surveys that match your interests.

step3.title: Share Your Opinions
step3.description: Complete surveys honestly and thoughtfully. Your insights help shape the products and services of the future.

step4.title: Earn and Redeem Rewards
step4.description: Accumulate points for each completed survey and redeem them for PayPal cash, gift cards, or other exciting rewards.

Footer.title: VOTLY
Footer.description: Votly is a social app on a mission to bring the polling industry into the 21st century.
Footer.copyright: © 2024 The Blockchain Labs. All Rights Reserved.

About.heroSubtitle: Join our community of survey takers and earn rewards while sharing your valuable opinions
About.communityDesc: Join thousands of active users sharing insights and earning rewards
About.insightsDesc: Your opinions help shape products and services of tomorrow
About.partnershipDesc: Work with leading brands and organizations worldwide
About.rewardsDesc: Earn points and redeem them for exciting rewards
About.missionText: At Votly, we're committed to creating a platform where every voice matters. We connect businesses with real people, fostering meaningful insights while rewarding participation.
About.contactText: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you!

Home.heroSubtitle: At Votly, your opinion matters, and we believe it should be rewarded. Join thousands of people shaping the future by participating in paid surveys. Your insights help brands improve their products, services, and experiences – and you earn real rewards in return!
Home.feature1Description: Every completed survey earns you points that can be redeemed for exciting rewards – from cash via PayPal to e-gift cards from top brands.
Home.feature2Description: Take surveys anytime, anywhere. Whether on your lunch break or while relaxing at home, your opinions can turn into earnings.
Home.feature3Description: Joining is quick and free. Complete your profile, and we'll match you with relevant surveys that suit your interests.
Home.feature4Description: Your privacy and security are our priorities. We ensure that all data is handled with the highest level of confidentiality.
Home.step1Description: Create your account in minutes. No hidden fees or commitments.
Home.step2Description: Based on your profile, we'll invite you to participate in surveys that match your interests.
Home.step3Description: Complete surveys honestly and thoughtfully. Your insights help shape the products and services of the future.
Home.step4Description: Accumulate points for each completed survey and redeem them for PayPal cash, gift cards, or other exciting rewards.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Data and Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: We at Votly value your privacy and collects personal information only as needed to deliver our services. By accessing or using our site or services, you agree to this Privacy Policy.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.informed: Right to be informed: You have the right to know how we use your information.
userRights.access: Right to request access: You can request access to your personal data.
userRights.cancel: Right to cancel your account: You can cancel your account at any point by requesting by email or using the cancel button on the portal.
userRights.correct: Right to correct and update: You can request corrections to your personal data and we will review and confirm after 30 days of receiving your request.

nonPersonal.title: Non-Personally Identifiable Information
nonPersonal.description: Browser type, IP address, operating system, cookies, etc. Used for analyzing usage, diagnosing issues, and improving our services.

personal.title: Personally Identifiable Information
personal.description: Includes name, email, contact info, payment details, etc. Collected when you register, communicate, or engage with our services.

infoUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
infoUsage.communication: Communication: Sending service updates, surveys, send incentives, or promotional messages.
infoUsage.verification: Identity Verification & Fraud Prevention: Verifying identity for security.
infoUsage.support: Customer Support: Addressing inquiries, issues, or disputes.
infoUsage.improvement: Improvement & Analysis: Improving our services based on feedback and usage.

dataSharing.title: Sharing Your Data
dataSharing.outsourcing: Outsourcing: We may share your information upon confirming with you with third parties for business functions.
dataSharing.publicForums: Public Forums: Data you share in public areas will be accessible publicly.
dataSharing.legal: Legal Requirements: We may disclose data to comply with legal obligations or protect interests.
dataSharing.marketing: Marketing: We may share data with third-party marketers with your consent.

security.title: Data Security
security.responsibility: Your Responsibility: Protect your personal data and login information.
security.measures: Our Measures: We use encryption for transmission, but security cannot be guaranteed.

contact.title: Contact & Concerns
contact.description: If you have privacy concerns, please contact us. Any disputes are subject to our Terms and conditions which is available on the website.

TermsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
TermsOfUse.intro: This Agreement is between Votly Global LLC FZ and you, effective upon your use of the website or the mobile app related to Votly. By using the services, you agree to these terms, which govern participation in free online surveys.

account.title: Account & Participation
account.description: To participate in surveys, you must register and maintain an accurate profile. Your details will be used to invite you to surveys but won't be shared with third parties. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account.

eligibility.title: Eligibility & Restrictions
eligibility.description: You must be at least 16 years old and reside in one of the eligible Arab countries. You can only maintain one account and any duplicated accounts will be deleted.

payments.title: Payments
payments.description: Rewards can be redeemed once you reach the minimum threshold. Payments will be made through electronic vouchers which you will receive by email.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your data is protected by Votly's Privacy Policy. Your account and profile details will not be shared with third parties, and you will not receive unwanted advertisements.

changes.title: Changes & Termination
changes.description: Votly reserves the right to modify the Agreement or terminate your account if you breach any terms. If changes are made, they will be communicated via email or on the Site.

legal.title: Legal Compliance
legal.description: By using the site, you affirm that you comply with the laws of your country. If you're using the services on behalf of an entity, you represent that you have the legal authority to bind that entity.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.description: All content on the Site and services, including trademarks, copyrights, and patents, are owned by Votly or its affiliates. You do not acquire any rights to this intellectual property by using the services.

warranties.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
warranties.description: Votly does not guarantee uninterrupted service or error-free access. It is not liable for any technical issues or disruptions to the service.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Content
thirdParty.description: Votly is not responsible for content or practices of third-party websites linked from the Site. Users should comply with local laws when accessing these sites.

security.title: Security
security.description: You are responsible for securing your login details and must notify Votly of any unauthorized access to your account.

liability.title: Liability
liability.description: Votly is not liable for service interruptions or any damages arising from its use. The company can modify or discontinue services at any time without notice.

compliance.title: Compliance with Local Laws
compliance.description: Users must comply with local laws when using the Site. Votly is not liable for any legal issues arising from access to the site in jurisdictions where it is prohibited.

miscellaneous.title: Miscellaneous
miscellaneous.description: If any part of this Agreement is found unenforceable, the rest remains valid. This Agreement is executed in English, with translations having equal validity in case of discrepancies.
